sentence: Read the Full Transcript William Brangham: This election in Georgia has also revealed a high-profile disagreement between Donald Trump, who we saw endorsing David Perdue for governor, and his former vice president, Mike Pence, who is backing current Governor Brian Kemp, and is holding a rally for him tonight.
author: PBS NewsHour
title: Tamara Keith and Amy Walter on whats at stake in Georgias primary election
